## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm run validate`)
- [ ] Commit messages use [conventional commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) (`feat:`, `fix:`, `refactor:`, `docs:`, `chore:`)
- [ ] Branch uses correct prefix (`feature/`, `fix/`, `docs/`, `refactor/`, `chore/`)
- [ ] If this completes a roadmap item: README.md "Roadmap" updated
- [ ] If this adds new planned work: Added to README.md "Roadmap"
- [ ] Design doc status updated (if applicable)

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for full guidelines.
